overview: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pep√© Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and pursues her.
title: Heaven Scent
